actions.committee: House Committee on Education and Labor
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Education and Labor.

official_title: A bill to amend the Occupational Safety and Health Act of 1970 to provide that certain persons engaged in farming shall not be considered employers for purposes of such act.

summary.text: Amends the Occupational Safety and Health Act to provide that persons employing fewer than 25 employees in connection with a farming operation, or persons entering into a contract or other arrangement for the furnishing and operation of any machinery used in connection with a farming operation shall not be considered employers for purposes of such Act.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Occupational Safety and Health Act of 1970 to provide that certain persons engaged in farming shall not be considered employers for purposes of such act.
